mil3.5.8:1.2: “bhante nagasena, imina namarupena kammam katam kusalam va akusalam va, kuhim tani kammani titthanti”ti?
mil3.5.8:1.3: “Anubandheyyum kho, maharaja, tani kammani chayava anapayini”ti.
mil3.5.8:1.4: “Sakka pana, bhante, tani kammani dassetum ‘idha va idha va tani kammani titthanti’”ti?
mil3.5.8:1.5: “Na sakka, maharaja, tani kammani dassetum ‘idha va idha va tani kammani titthanti’”ti.
mil3.5.8:2.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, yanimani rukkhani anibbattaphalani, sakka tesam phalani dassetum ‘idha va idha va tani phalani titthanti’”ti.
mil3.5.8:2.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, abbocchinnaya santatiya na sakka tani kammani dassetum ‘idha va idha va tani kammani titthanti’”ti.
